And Simon Cowell made little secret that he was bored and ready to get on to his next series, The X Factor,`` already a hit in Britain and scheduled to launch stateside this fall. Ellen DeGeneres , Ms. Paula Abdul 's replacement, never jelled with the other judges, including singer Kara DioGuardi , who had been brought on for the 2009 season to bolster the show in advance of Ms. Paula Abdul 's expected departure. Now Ms. Ellen DeGeneres and Ms. Kara DioGuardi are both gone. The saga of the`` American Idol phenomenon, from its origins in the 2001 hit British series`` Pop Idol'' right up to Simon Cowell 's departure, is the focus of Richard Rushfield's breezy, gossipy`` American Idol: The Untold Story.
